alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:51PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 330 PM PDT... At 251 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles southwest of Charleston to 13 miles northeast of Montello. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wells, Mountain City, Charleston, Jarbidge, Montello, Gibbs Ranch, Jackpot, Contact, Hd Summit, Moor Summit, North Fork and Wild Horse Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
